name: Out of Hand (Evan Polekoff)
description:
What would adventuring be like if your arms had a mind of their own? Will you make it through these trials and tribulations unscathed or will your mischievous mitts be your downfall. Be careful, because things are about to get Out of Hand!

Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam in 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

Known Bugs:

- On some computers, the left arm will swing wildly when not holding an item.

Additional Credits---

Environment/FX Art Packs: synty and polygon arsenal

Chibi Model: torchwurm
